creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles Pillsbury, Phillip Winston Pillsbury, Mary Stinson Pillsbury Lord, Katherine Stevens Pillsbury McKee and Helen Winston Pillsbury Becker in memory of Charles S. Pillsbury.
description: lid, with Feng Huang (phoenix); lid has tendrils and foliage and flying ducks of gold wire with large granulation on silver; silver with gold filigree.
title: Vessel lid with phoenix motif
